# AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.plain

**Case**

A plain button style.

## Declaration

```swift
case plain
```

## Discussion

Use this style to set the button to match the system style, except without a blurred background view.

## Button Styles

- **AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.custom**: A custom button style.
- **AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.system**: A system-defined button style.
title: AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.plain
